Skill Description: Decrease Skill CD time by 20%, when chain reaches 100 or more
When your HP is under 50%, Shield Dmg will increase by 45%
Increase Def by 25% for 20 seconds, when receiving 5% or more DMG
For every successful hit, 30% of chances to Freeze your enemy for 2 seconds
When killing soldiers, increase ATK spd by 5% for 5 seconds
Increase Crit Chance by 20%, when HP is under 50%
When killing soldiers, increase SHIELD DMG by 50% for 10 seconds
Decrease Skill CD time by 35%, when HP is below 35%
Increase CRIT CHANCE by 15%, when 2 or more skills are on CD
When your HP is under 50%, SHIELD DMG will increase by 35%
Increase CRIT CHANCE by 1% for every 50 CHAIN reached, can be stacked up to 5 times
Increase ATK SPD by 15% for 20 seconds, when receiving 5% or more DMG
